reviewText: OK, but not as good as season1......it seems as though the producers tried to end each episode with some type of whimsical finality.....good story lines and drama ruined by silly endings---------season 1, much better
Wow, excellent western, one of the best!
Love the reruns on TV INSP.  Waiting for a DVD for region 1.
I would really love to have season 2! Too bad it's not available.
When will this entire series be available for all of us with DVD's and not just those who have a specific type?  Would love to own the whole series, but need it to be available to Region 1.
This was exactly what I wanted and it came in great condition. I love watching this show. Thank you very much.

Season 3 of this classic western has some of the most entertaining and certianly some of the most comical episodes of the series along with action, romance and fascinating characters.  The DVD is beautifully remastered and episodes very nearly uncut, but as it's a German release, if you're in the US you need a region-free or all-region DVD player to play it and must set the language option to English in the DVD menu to hear the original actors in English.
